body_html: I believe this may be happening to me as well. I am running on a GeForce 770 with only 2GB memory (1.8GB free) and tensorflow claims to allocate 1.6GiB of memory. I'm not sure about the gradients, but when I output my loss I get nan. My model doesn't perform any operations that would produce nan (only additions, subtractions, and multiplications).

body: I believe this may be happening to me as well. I am running on a GeForce 770 with only 2GB memory (1.8GB free) and tensorflow claims to allocate 1.6GiB of memory. I'm not sure about the gradients, but when I output my loss I get nan. My model doesn't perform any operations that would produce nan (only additions, subtractions, and multiplications).
